page.title: 13RECREATION - SULLINGTON
page.content: Recreational facilities in Sullington serve a large area of the community. The Storrington Lawn Tennis Club has its headquarters in Greyfriars Lane. Membership is open to all and includes facilities for coaching junior members. There are five hard courts which are open throughout the year. Storrington Squash Club, also in Greyfriars Lane, is affiliated to the Squash Rachquets Association. Membership is limited to three hundred and fifty; juniors and students play during off peak hours. There are three courts, with showers and changing rooms and coaching is available.
